mapper.update: update ecs_consumer set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cId = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cId, name, sex, userId, pwd, phone, birthday, address, note from ecs_consumer
